 2018-11772018-09-20,  ,  ,  ,  NRCAN
ActNational Energy Board Act
Canadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectReconsideration of Trans Mountain Expansion Project OH-001-2014
PrecisOrder Directing that the Board Reconsider the recommendations and all terms or conditions set out in its May 19, 2016 report entitled TRANS MOUNTAIN EXPANSION PROJECT OH-001-2014 that are relevant to addressing the issues specified by the Federal Court of Appeal in paragraph 770 of TSLEIL-WAUTUH NATION v. CANADA.
